byline.original: Correspondence of the New-York Daily Times

lead_paragraph: The Jury trials In the U. S. Circuit Court are set down for to-morrow, but whether the District Attorney will be ready to proceed of not is uncertain. Yesterday the Grand Jury found true bills against Samuel Williams, Joshua Hammond, Henry Curtis, Washington Williams, William Thomas and Nelson Ford, and ignored the bill against Noah Burley.

headline.main: PHILADELPHIA.; Treason Cases-Death of a New-Yorker-Murderer Sentenced--General Wool.
